thisYear.title: This Year
thisYear.text: Set in the sunny city of Tel-Aviv, YGLF is a community event built by developers for developers. This non-profit conference is aimed at delivering high quality content, regarding relevant topics, that any Frontend admirer would love to hear. Bringing in internationally recognized speakers and attendees, with the young and vibrant atmosphere Startup nation has to offer, YGLF creates a buzzling bustle of software engineers from around the globe. And as usual, a hefty lunch, refreshing beer and plenty of coffee breaks spark the most interesting conversations between colleagues and strangers alike.

team.title: The Team
team.text: A small group of super dedicated people, working hard around the clock to make the most stunning conference ever. During YGLF Conference, you can find a member of the team at the registration desk at all times. Don't hesistate to come and talk to us, if you need any assitance.

theVenue.title: The Venue
theVenue.text: The elegant Cameri Theater, Tel Aviv's municipal theater, is where this year's YGLF conference will once again take place. Located in the center of bohemic Tel Aviv, it is considered one of Israel's largest and most respected performance halls. The Cameri holds over dozens of yearly productions, inlcuding a touring company. Classical and modern will meet under an urban wrap, for another unforgettable conference.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.text: For the first time, join us for one two YGLF master class workshops with world renowned experts. Use this opportunity to hone your skills and delve into the cutting edge of Frontend development.

meetOurSpeakers.title: Meet Our Speakers
meetOurSpeakers.text: This year YGLF is hosting amazing speakers from all around the world. Listed below are our keynote speakers. For the full lineup you can visit our speakers page. Make sure to check back regularly, as this is just the beginning, there is a lot more to come!

workshopsPage.title: Workshops
workshopsPage.text: For the first time, YGLF will be holding two Master class workshops, led by world-renowned experts. Sign up and join us on November 1st at the Tel-Aviv Port for the opportunity to hone your skills and delve into the cutting edge of Frontend development.

sponsorsPage.title: Sponsors
sponsorsPage.text: YGLF is a leading community event. Being so, it bridges between extraordinary talents from the Israeli Frontend realm and the fantastic companies that shape the web we live in. Thus, creating limitless opportunities for beautiful cooperations, knowledge sharing and networking. We would like to thank our partners for helping us to make this great event happen.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.text: YGLF is a 2-day event. Days start at 8:30am with breakfast and a friendly gathering. Talk sessions last 30 minutes, except the longer keynotes and a few other surprises along the day :) Of course, a wealthy lunch, refreshing coffee breaks and quality beers are served throughout the day to make it extra fun!
